title.native: ヤマノススメ サードシーズン

description:
The third season of Yama no Susume.

Aoi and Hinata are childhood friends. Aoi prefers staying indoors and is afraid of heights, whereas Hinata is outgoing and loves mountaineering. They both decide to climb a mountain in order to see a sunrise they saw together when they were younger.

In the coming third season, they enjoy hiking beautiful mountains with colored leaves and the story gets even more colorful when they become friends with local school girls!!

(Source: Yomiuri TV Enterprise)

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Mountaineering
tags.description: Prominently features characters discussing or hiking mountains.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/64664693)

Yamamoto's interest in working in the anime industry piqued in high school after realizing how noticeable the difference in episodes were depending on the episode director in charge. One of his favourites shows included [Seisenshi Dunbine](https://anilist.co/anime/929/).

In the late '80s, he joined [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/) as a production assistant after finding out that it's how many of the studio's directors started off. There he met and studied under [Shuuji Iuchi](https://anilist.co/staff/115833/) on his shows [Madou King Granzort](https://anilist.co/anime/2818/) and [Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru](https://anilist.co/anime/4807/). Then after having gone freelance he got his first shot as a director as one of the three unit directors on Iuchi's [Ranma ½ film](https://anilist.co/anime/418/) in 1991.

In 2001, Yamamoto made his debut as a series director on [Shiawase Sou no Okojo-san](https://anilist.co/anime/2934/), soon after which he worked as the first director of the long-running [Keroro Gunsou](https://anilist.co/anime/516/). In 2006 he directed the well-received [NHK ni Youkoso!](https://anilist.co/anime/1210/)

More recent directorial works of his include [Yama no Susume](https://anilist.co/anime/14355/) and [Shounen Maid](https://anilist.co/anime/21321/).

[Profile (TaWaRa)](http://www.ta-wa-ra.com/creator/%e3%83%86%e3%82%b9%e3%83%88) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomoshima_th) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tom_oshima/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom-H@ck) Introduction Tomohiro Oshima, better known by stage name Tom-H@ck, is a Japanese guitarist, producer, composer and arranger. He is also a member of, and a production manager for the groups OxT and MYTH & ROID. Biography His musical interest started when he was 9-years-old, as its when he got to experience playing a musical instrument for the first time in his life. Later at the age of 15, he gained more experience, but this time he got to play a guitar instead, and at the same time he also started to compose music. He started to work as a composer, an arranger and a guitarist for the company Far East Peach, where he worked as a sound creator. As of 2016 he has mainly been active in the joint unit with artist Ooishi Masayoshi, titled OxT (Ooishi x Tom-H@ck), and in the band MYTH & ROID. He's also representative director for TaWaRa Co, LTD, which he established with his own production team from F.M.F Co, LTD. Affiliations - TaWaRa Co, LTD. (2016-) - OxT (2015-) - MYTH & ROID (2015-) - Flyingpan Records (2012-) - F.M.F Corporation (Source: Wikipedia)

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akitakanori)**

**Aki Takanori (安藝貴範)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
**Kaneda Kenichiro (兼田健一郎)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
**Hiroyasu Oyama** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

[Twitter](https://x.com/kg_ui) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/kgui.bsky.social) | [Pixiv](https://kagaai.fanbox.cc/) | [Tumblr](https://kiki223.tumblr.com/)

Admires, and is heavily inspired by both [Naoko Yamada](https://anilist.co/staff/102498/) and [Yuusuke Matsuo](https://anilist.co/staff/114311/).
